label: 在原業平
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: d. 880.  He is credited by some as being the author of the Ise-monogatari, a collection of short stories in two books (kan).  These stories generally center about Japanese poems (waka) by Ariwara Narihira.  The date, authorship, an reason for the name of the work are all disputed (Part A, p. 269).  [伊勢物語、巻、和歌]
